snippet: The city’s Finance Department didn’t warn homeowners about changes in its assessment methods, and it relied too much on a flawed computer system, Comptroller John C. Liu found.
lead_paragraph: The city’s Finance Department didn’t warn homeowners about changes in its assessment methods, and it relied too much on a flawed computer system, Comptroller John C. Liu found.

headline.seo: Comptroller’s Audits Fault City’s Property Valuation
headline.main: Audits Find Flaws in City’s Property Assessments
headline.print_headline: Audits Find Flaws in City Property Assessments
